Class BoardGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent

              • view.GUIView.BoardGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ReplayObserver, RolitObserver
    public class BoardGUI
extends RolitPanel
implements RolitObserver, ReplayObserver
    This class is in charge of managing and updating all the CellGUIs when needed.
    Author:
    PMC

      onRegister method overridden (RolitObserver interface) It is in charge of updating the state with the new one
      void onReplayLeftButton()
      onReplayLeftButton method overridden (ReplayObserver interface) It is in charge of retrieving the state of the last cube added to its previous, so that the replay can go back, and then updating the replay
      void onReplayRightButton()
      onReplayRightButton method overridden (ReplayObserver interface) It is in charge of updating the replay (already been loaded with a new state)
      void onReplayStatusChange​(java.lang.String msg)
      onReplayStatusChange method overridden (ReplayObserver interface)
      void onTurnPlayed​(GameState state)
      onTurnPlayed method overridden (RolitObserver interface) It is in charge of updating the state with the new one then calling update() method
      void update()
      This method is in charge of updating all the CellGUIs given the new information retrieved from methods such as onRegister or onTurnPlayed.
